original_title: Worlds Collided - The Season Two - Part Two
overview: After the events of the first season, Zoey stays with Max to find out what happened to her family on Earth, but with bad people walking around it won't be an easy task, especially not being able to trust her own friends and maybe not even yourself!  Will Max and Zoey make it through one more step?  New challenges, New characters, new locations.....  A BIGGER WORLD!!!
title: Worlds Collided - The Season Two - Part Two
